summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue, Fourteenth Avenue Northeast and Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, each from Northlake Avenue to East Fiftieth Street; East Fortieth Street, East Forty-second Street and East Forty-fifth Street, each from Fifteenth Avenue Northeast to Tenth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains of proper dimensions therein, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 536 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
